name: OreTransmutation
title: Ore Transmutation
author: InferiorRook
description: This mod adds a new centrifuge recipe that consumes U238 and either a Copper or Iron Ore to produce the other. Also allows Space Science to be converted into the five other core packs, Military is left out. Great for Danger0us maps where you are overloaded with one ore, or are going old school and just want to lauch rockets.
